result.trip_overview_narrative: The school organizes educational field trips designed to facilitate fast and efficient learning by connecting students to real-world experiences beyond the classroom. These trips provide rich learning opportunities related to classroom concepts.

evidence.quote: Educational field trips facilitate fast and efficient learning, bridge gaps and provide rich experiences related to concepts taught in class. They provide unique opportunities for learning that extend beyond the walls of the classroom.
